prompt:
Am I in the wrong in the following situation?

"""
AITA for hitting my husband?

It was a closed fist hit to the face, then he ran off and I didn't see him for a few hours, when I did see him he had a small bruise, he called me a bitch and then took his car keys and drove off. I haven't seen him sense, am I the asshole for punching him or is he just being a baby?

Edit: so someone has made a troll account pretending to be my husband, this is NOT me and I have NO idea who they are.

Edit 2: I realise that what I did was wrong, and I'll definitely apologize to him, this was the first time this type of thing ever happened, and I do think we can make up.
